# HOW YOU CAN CONTRIBUTE TO THE CODABENCH PROJECT

## 1. Being a Codabench user.

- Create a user account on https://codalab.lisn.fr and on https://codabench.org.
- Register on https://codabench.org to this existing competition (IRIS-tuto) https://www.codabench.org/competitions/1115/  and make a submission (from https://github.com/codalab/competition-examples/tree/master/codabench/iris): sample_result_submission and sample_code_submission. See https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/User_Participating-in-a-Competition
- Create your own private competition (from https://github.com/codalab/competition-examples/tree/master/codabench/ ). See https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Getting-started-with-Codabench

 ## 2. Setting a local instance of Codabench.

- Follow the tutorial in codabench wiki: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Codabench-Installation. According to your hosting OS, you might have to tune your environment file a bit. Try without enabling the SSL protocol (doing so, you don't need a domain name for the server). Try using the embedded Minio storage solution instead of a private cloud storage.
- If needed, you can also look into https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/How-to-deploy-Codabench-on-your-server

## 3. Using one's local instance

- Create your own competition and play with it. You can look at the output logs of each different docker container.
- Setting you as an admin of your platform (https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Administrator-procedures#give-superuser-privileges-to-an-user) and visit the Django Admin menu: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Administrator-procedures#give-superuser-privileges-to-an-user

## 4. Setting an autonomous computer-worker on your PC

- Configure and launch the docker container: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Compute-Worker-Management---Setup
- Create a private queue on your new own competition on the production server codabench.org: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Queue-Management#create-queue
- Assign your own compute-worker to this private queue instead of the default queue.
Codabench is a flexible, easy-to-use and reproducible benchmarking platform. Check our paper at Patterns Cell Press https://hubs.li/Q01fwRWB0

Codabench is an open-source web-based platform that enables researchers, developers, and data scientists to collaborate, with the goal of advancing research fields where machine learning and advanced computation is used. Codabench helps to solve many common problems in the arena of data-oriented research through its online community where people can share worksheets and participate in competitions and benchmarks. It can be seen as a version 2 of [CodaLab Competitions](https://github.com/codalab/codalab-competitions).

_To participate, or even organize your own benchmarks or competitions, **you don't need to install anything**, you just need to sign in an instance of the platform (e.g. [this one](https://www.codabench.org/)). 
If you wish to configure your own instance of Codabench platform, here are the instructions:_


```
$ cp .env_sample .env
$ docker compose up -d
$ docker compose exec django ./manage.py migrate
$ docker compose exec django ./manage.py generate_data
$ docker compose exec django ./manage.py collectstatic --noinput
```

You can now login as username "admin" with password "admin" at http://localhost/

If you ever need to reset the database, use the script `./reset_db.sh`

For more information about installation, checkout [Codabench Basic Installation Guide](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Codabench-Installation) and [How to Deploy Server](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/How-to-deploy-Codabench-on-your-server).

Copyright (c) 2020-2022, Université Paris-Saclay.
This software is released under the Apache License 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use the software except in compliance with the License.

The text of the Apache License 2.0 can be found online at:
http://www.opensource.org/licenses/apache2.0.php

## New Features
* [Add question mark on auto migrate](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1536)
* [Show `in-use` for starting kit and public data](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1533)
* [Precision column and leaderboard rule added to dump](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1525)
* [Show leaderboard and detailed result page to approved participants only](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1524)
* [Resources bundles dumps](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1505)
* [WIP Downloading submissions v1](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1548)
     * From  [WIP Downloading submissions v1](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1541)


## Bug Fixes
* [Remove Dockerfile.celery](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1518)
* [Programs and datasets bug fixed](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1528)
* [Leaderboard API 500 error resolved](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1527)
* [Double the soft time limit on the storage analytics snapshot task](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1531)
* [Public competitions: participants count added](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1529)
* [Competition console prints removed](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1539)
* [Change base image for Dockerfile.flower](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1520)
* [Updated `bpython` to fix shell_plus error](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1543)
* [More general exception in views.py](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1512)

**Full list of changes**: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/compare/v1.10.0...v1.11.0

# Manual intervention needed if upgrading
You will need to rebuild all your docker images. More information on [this wiki page](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Rebuilding-all-docker-images)


## New Features
* [Made some changes to have an access.log file for analytics](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1488)
* [Update Python using Poetry (Issue #1413)](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1416)

## Minor UI Changes
* [Remove private competitions and competition participants counters from home page](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1486)
* [Add explanation about submission limit reset](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1499)
* [Add a display when there is no submission limit](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1502)

## Bug Fixes
* [Fix server status when not logged in](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1497)
* [Fix celery_config.py](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1503)



**Full list of changes**: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/compare/v1.9.2...v1.10.0

# Manual intervention needed if upgrading
You will need to add a new line into your `.env` file. More information on [this wiki page](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Add-line-into-%60.env%60-for-default-queue-worker-duration)

## New Features
* [Public competition filtering](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1381)

* [Submission ID in leaderboard](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1370)
* [CPU limit on default queue](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1154)



## Bug Fixes
* [Fix revoking tasks on custom queues](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1352)
* [Prevent LimitOverrunError with large output lines](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1351)
* [Auto-migrate leaderboard submissions](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1341)
* [Clean code in celery_config.py](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1420)

**Full list of changes**: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/compare/v1.7.0...v1.8.0

New logos will need to be created for each competition. You can take a look at [this wiki page](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Create-new-logos-for-each-competition) to know how.


## New Features
* [Clickable username in competition header](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1291)
* [Replaced "date of last entry" by "date"](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1292)
* [Quota message details and link to user quote](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1293)

* [Task deletion warning](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1316)
* [Created Codabench Statistics](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1307)
* [Files Tab: show login if not logged in + hide available column from no…](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1310)
* [Queues - show competitions using the queue - Update](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1320)


## Bug fixes
* [Logo Icons too big fix](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1306)
* [Delete rerun submission doesn't delete original submission anymore](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1311)
* [Rerun submission when a task used is deleted](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1301)
* [Queues - show competitions using the queue](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1317)

**Full list of changes**: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/compare/v1.4.1...v1.5.0

result.description:
## New features
* [IDF logo place changed](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1267)
* [Added Partners logos on the main page](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1264)
* [Added HTTP proxy environment variables for RabbitMQ](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1261)
* [Storage Quota per user](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1254)
* [Storage monitoring tool](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1248)

**Full list of changes**: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0

## New features
* [Admins can now access private comp without secret_key](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1226)
* [Server status - show parent's queue for child submissions](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1222)
* [Competition Whitelist Emails feature](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1223)
* [Added Chalearn logo to main page](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1233)

## Bug fixes
* [Respect submission limit per day](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1224)

**Full list of changes**: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0

## Bug Fixes
* [Changes to not allow users to edit emails in the profile page](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1218)
* [Main banner logos](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1219)
   - LISN
   - Paris-Saclay
   - CNRS


**Full list of changes**: https://github.com/codalab/codabench/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

**If you are running Codabench v1.0, you need to follow this guide to upgrade Codabench : https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Upgrade-RabbitMQ**
## Release notes
### New features
- RabbitMQ upgraded to the latest version (3.12). IMPORTANT guide to upgrade Codabench from v1.0 to v1.1 : https://github.com/codalab/codabench/wiki/Upgrade-RabbitMQ
- [Server status - Queue name displayed](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1091)
- [Server status - username is a link to profile](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1092)
- [Server status - submission file size added](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1093)
- [Submissions panel - show remaining submissions count](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1094)
- [Server status - show/hide child submissions](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1096)
- [Server status - Show to all users](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1098)
- [Competition Terms page](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1111)
- [Forum - usernames are clickable links](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1112)
- [Forum - user image displayed](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1113)
- [Serves status - Queue added in submission](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1114)
- [Forum - Add new post button](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1116)
- [Competition Dump - Task with/without keys ](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1120)
- [Submission panel - refresh date for new created submission](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1122)
- [Max submissions](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1123)
- [Server status - Scoring host name added](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1126)
- [Edit Profile - display name](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1129)
- [Participant Registration Status](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1133)
- [Refresh used submissions](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1134)
- [Options to make programs input data available](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1136)
- [Private competition register](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1137)
- [Public competitions order](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1139)
- [Hide leaderboard when leaderboard is hidden](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1147)
- [Resources : Show edit/delete task to owner only](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1157)
- [Add help in Files table](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1158)
- [Compute worker - docker pull image + execution time limit crash](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1161)
- [Changing rabbit connection timeout](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1181)

### Bug fixes
- [HTML - Markdown - Latex : Rendering Fixed](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1090)
- [Leaderboard Download - 500 error resolved](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1107)
- [Create Dump with keys](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1110)
- [Fix submission stuck at scoring](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1130)
- [Server status - Rabbit MQ and Flower links fixed](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1144)
- [Server status - flower and rabbit mq links](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1145)
- [blessings for shell_plus](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1151)
- [Phase Dates - UI Bug removed](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1163)
- [ghost files fix](https://github.com/codalab/codabench/pull/1165)
result.name: v1.1.0

result.description: This is the 1st stable release for production environment. Let's enjoy !
result.name: 1st release for production
